state_description: This screen allows users to view and manage all installed applications on their Mac. Users can select applications to uninstall, view application sizes, and sort applications by name.

enables.name: Select Application
enables.description: Select an application to view more details or prepare for uninstallation.

enables.name: Sort Applications
enables.description: Sort the list of applications by name or size.

enables.name: Search Applications
enables.description: Search for a specific application using the search bar.

enables.name: Uninstall Application
enables.description: Uninstall the selected application from the Mac.
